item.title: Major Factor Affecting Freight Train Collision Severity At Road-Rail Level Crossing Using Multinomial Logit Model
Smart Fleet Allocation
item.description: In this project a a digital tool was developed for improving the decision making about the taking different operation policies on how to dispatch and distribute the cargo wagon across the railway network in Iran. The project employed a mixture of optimization models and data analysis to provide optimal solutions for various scenarios for minimizing operational costs, maximizing availability of wagons. The project delivered a user-friendly interface using AnyLogic© that helps the decision makers in planning and executing the fleet allocation strategies.

item.title: Cargo for Rail
item.description: In this project a a decision aiding tool was developed for improving the decision making about the taking different operation policies on how to improve the efficiency of operations related to logistics of mineral cargo with rail. The project analyses the current situation and assessed multiple improvement policies using discrete event simulation in Planimate©.

item.title: Risk Analysis of Stationary Rail Cars Containing Hazardous Materials; A Case Study
